sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/ , A.C_PATTERN AS pattern , A.C_DESCRIPTION AS description , A.C_RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType , A.C_SORT AS sort , A.C_REG_DT AS regDt , A.C_REG_ID AS regId , A.C_MOD_DT AS modDt , A.C_MOD_ID AS modId
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_PATTERN AS pattern , C_DESCRIPTION AS description , C_RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType , C_SORT AS sort , C_REG_DT AS regDt , C_REG_ID AS regId , C_MOD_DT AS modDt , C_MOD_ID AS modId FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_PATTERN = #pattern# , C_RESOURCE_TYPE = #resourceType# , C_SORT = #sort# , C_DESCRIPTION = #description# , C_MOD_DT = #modDt# , C_MOD_ID = #modId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_PATTERN AS pattern , C_DESCRIPTION AS description , C_RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType , C_SORT AS sort , C_REG_DT AS regDt , C_REG_ID AS regId , C_MOD_DT AS modDt , C_MOD_ID AS modId FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_PATTERN AS pattern , C_DESCRIPTION AS description , C_RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType , C_SORT AS sort , C_REG_DT AS regDt , C_REG_ID AS regId , C_MOD_DT AS modDt , C_MOD_ID AS modId FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.select: /* getChildCountByParentId */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CHILDCOUNTBYPARENTID FROM T_COMPREHENSIVETREE_SPRING WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_id#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_RESOURCES WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#

AND C_ID NOT IN

#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_RESOURCES SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
